upcoming.title: Thanksgiving Break
upcoming.description: No school.  Enjoy your break, stay healthy.

upcoming.title: Spirit Shirt Sale
upcoming.description: It's that time again to show your Panther Pride and purchase a T-shirt or Hoodie.  Checkout Fundraiser link for more information.

upcoming.title: General Meeting
upcoming.description: PTA General Meeting will be held on Thursday from 5:00pm - 6:00pm.  Email will be sent out on December 1st with virtual meeting details.  Hope to see you there.

upcoming.title: Holiday Break
upcoming.description: No school.  Enjoy your break, stay healthy and see you in the New Year.

volunteer.title: T-Shirt Order Collection
volunteer.description: If you have some time we would love help on collecting T-Shirt orders and calculate t-shirt type, count, color, etc...  We will be meeting in the cafeteria.

volunteer.title: Goody Bag assembly
volunteer.description: We will be assembling Holiday goodie bags for all students to take home before the Holiday break.  If you have some time stop by and help.  We will be meeting on the stage.

activities.description: Just before the start of the school year this is a nice social gathering to get the year started and a nice meet and greet for incoming Kindergarten families.
We work with the school library to help decorate, setup, sell and takedown the book fair in both the Fall and Spring.
We work with the school PE teacher(s) to help setup, run stations and take down all the obstacles for the kids to have a fun day in the sun.
We hold this event to get our Parkway Families together an enjoy a nice night out with friends and watch a movie.  We setup this event and sell concessions.
Every grade will have at least one Field Trip that they will be traveling in a school bus.  We provide financial support to help keep cost down for families.
We try to host 2 parties per school year where we provide fun games, activies and snacks for the kids.  We setup, run stations, takedown and cleanup for these activities.

activities.activity: Muffins with Mom and Donuts with Dudes
activities.description: Two activities we hold near our hearts as an appreciation to all Mother figures, and Father figures in our students life as an appreciation for all your hard work.
A good way to celebrate all students hard work with a fun festivity.  We hold the event and setup, run stations and cleanup all stations which include slides, snacks and fun obstacles.
